elements.name: mica:ClarificationRegardingEmoneyTokenOfferTerms
elements.label: Clarification regarding e-money token offer terms
elements.documentation: ‘Warning  This summary should be read as an introduction to the crypto-asset white paper.  The prospective holder should base any decision to purchase this e-money token on the content of the crypto-asset white paper as a whole and not on the summary alone.  The offer to the public of this crypto-asset does not constitute an offer or solicitation to purchase financial instruments and that any such offer or solicitation can be made only by means of a prospectus or other offer documents pursuant to the applicable national law.  This crypto-asset white paper does not constitute a prospectus as referred to in Regulation (EU) 2017/1129 of the European Parliament and of the Council or any other offer document pursuant to Union or national law.’
elements.terseLabel: I.05 Warning in accordance with Article 51(6), second subparagraph of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114

elements.name: mica:ClarificationRegardingOtherTokenOfferTerms
elements.label: Clarification regarding other token offer terms
elements.documentation:
'Article 6(7), second subparagraph, of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. ‘The summary should be read as an introduction to the crypto-asset white paper. The prospective holder should base any decision to purchase the asset-refenced token on the content of the crypto-asset white paper as a whole and not on the summary alone.
The offer to the public of the crypto-asset does not constitute an offer or solicitation to purchase financial instruments and any such offer or solicitation can be made only by means of a prospectus or other offer documents pursuant to the applicable national law.
The crypto-asset white paper does not constitute a prospectus as referred to in Regulation (EU) 2017/1129 of the European Parliament and of the Council (36) or any other offer document pursuant to Union or national law.’
elements.terseLabel: 07 Warning in accordance with Article 6(7), second subparagraph, of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114

elements.documentation: Referred to in Article 109 of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114, as specified in accordance with paragraph 8 of that Article.
elements.terseLabel: A description of the characteristics of the other token, including the data necessary for classification of the crypto-asset white paper in the register referred to in Article 109 of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114, as specified in accordance with paragraph 8 of that Article

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfCharacteristicsOfOtherTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of characteristics of other token [text block]
elements.documentation:
A brief, clear and non-technical description of the characteristics of the crypto asset including information about rights and obligations of the purchaser, procedure and conditions for the exercise of those rights, conditions, if any, under which these rights and obligations may be modified.
Where the white paper concerns a utility token, information about the quality and quantity of goods or services to which the utility tokens give access and restrictions on the transferability.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfCompensationSchemesExplanatory
elements.label: Description of compensation schemes [text block]
elements.documentation: Where the field above is true, a description of compensation schemes.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfConnectionBetweenAssetreferencedTokenIssuerAndEntityRunningDLTExplanatory
elements.label: Description of connection between asset-referenced token issuer and entity running DLT [text block]
elements.documentation: Description of the connection between the issuer and entity running the distributed ledger technology used to issue the crypto-asset, including if the protocols are run or controlled by a person closely connected to the project participants.
elements.terseLabel: A.24 Description of the connection between the issuer and the entity running the DLT

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfConnectionBetweenEmoneyTokenIssuerAndEntityRunningDLTExplanatory
elements.label: Description of connection between e-money token issuer and entity running DLT [text block]
elements.documentation: Description of the connection between the issuer and entity running the distributed ledger technology used to issue the crypto-asset, including if the protocols are run or controlled by a person closely connected to the project participants.
elements.terseLabel: A.20 Description of the connection between the issuer and the entity running the DLT

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOtherTokenCharacteristicsExplanatory
elements.label: Description of other token characteristics [text block]
elements.documentation: A description of the characteristics of the crypto-asset.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOtherTokenCompensationSchemesExplanatory
elements.label: Description of crypto-asset compensation schemes [text block]
elements.documentation: Where the field above is true, a description of the compensation schemes.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfDLTFunctionalityForAssetreferencedTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of DLT functionality for asset-referenced token [text block]
elements.documentation: If the DLT is operated by the issuer or a third party acting on the issuer’s behalf, a detailed description of the functioning of such distributed ledger technology.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfDLTFunctionalityForOtherTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of DLT functionality for other token [text block]
elements.documentation: If the DLT is operated by the issuer or a third party acting on the issuer’s behalf, a detailed description of the functioning of such distributed ledger technology.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfDLTFunctionalityForEmoneyTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of DLT functionality for e-money token [text block]
elements.documentation: If the DLT is operated by the issuer or a third party acting on the issuer’s behalf, a detailed description of the functioning of such distributed ledger technology.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfEmoneyTokenCharacteristicsExplanatory

elements.documentation: A description of the characteristics of the asset referenced token being offered or admitted to trading.

elements.documentation: Where applicable, information about the costs involved.

elements.label: Description of issuer-related risks [text block]
elements.documentation: A description of the risks associated with the issuer of the asset-referenced token, including risks related to the issuer's financial situation, risks related to the issuer's business activities and industry, legal and regulatory risk, governance and internal control risk.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfKeyEnergySourcesAndMethodologiesExplanatory
elements.label: Description of key energy sources and methodologies [text block]
elements.documentation: Sources and methodologies used in relation to the information reported in fields S.10 and S.11.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOfferExpensesExplanatory

elements.documentation: Expenses related to the offer to the public of crypto-assets, in an official currency or any other crypto-assets.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOfferexpensesForAssetreferencedTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of offer expenses for asset-referenced token [text block]
elements.documentation: Expenses related to the offer to the public of the asset-referenced token, in an official currency or any other crypto-assets. If more than one type of expense, expenses should be presented in a tabular format.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOfferrelatedRisksExplanatory
elements.label: Description of offer-related risks [text block]
elements.documentation: A description of the risks associated with the offer to the public of the asset-referenced token or its admission to trading.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfOfferrelatedRisksForOtherTokenExplanatory
elements.label: Description of offer-related risks for other token [text block]

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfPastMilestonesExplanatory

elements.label: Description of reserve asset investment policy [text block]
elements.documentation: If a part of the reserve assets is invested, a description of the investment policy for the reserve assets.

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfRightsOfHoldersExplanatory
elements.label: Description of rights of holders [text block]
elements.documentation: Description of the rights of the holders when the issuer is not able to fulfil its obligations, including in insolvency.

elements.terseLabel: F.1 Risks related to asset reserve

elements.label: Description of risks related to operationalisation of asset-referenced token project [text block]

elements.label: DescriptionOfTechnologyrelatedRisksForOtherTokenExplanatory

elements.name: mica:DescriptionOfTokenrelatedRisksExplanatory
elements.label: Description of token-related risks [text block]
elements.documentation: Description of the risks associated with the asset-referenced token, in particular with regard to the asset referenced and environmental risks.

elements.name: mica:InformationAboutAssetreferencedTokenAbstract
elements.label: Information about asset-referenced token [abstract]

elements.name: mica:InformationAboutAssetreferencedTokenIssuersFinancialConditionForPastThreeYearsExplanatory
elements.label: Information about asset-referenced token issuer's financial condition for past three years [text block]
elements.documentation:
Financial condition of the issuer over the past three years.
This shall be assessed based on a fair review of the development and performance of the business of the issuer and of its position for each year and interim period for which historical financial information is required, including the causes of material changes.
The review shall be a balanced and comprehensive analysis of the development and performance of the business of the issuer and of its position, consistent with the size and complexity of the business.
The analysis shall include both financial and, where appropriate, non-financial Key Performance Indicators relevant to the particular business.
The analysis shall, where appropriate, include references to, and additional explanations of, amounts reported in the annual financial statements (when available), information regarding unusual or infrequent events or new developments, materially affecting the income from operations and indicate the extent to which income was so affected, information concerning capital resources (both short term and long term) and an explanation of the sources and amounts of and a narrative description of the cash flows.
elements.terseLabel: A.14 Financial condition for the past three years

elements.name: mica:InformationAboutAssetreferencedTokenIssuersFinancialConditionSinceRegistrationExplanatory
elements.label: Information about asset-referenced token issuer's financial condition since registration [text block]
elements.documentation:
Where the issuer has not been established for the past three years, its financial condition since the date of its registration.
This shall be assessed based on a fair review of the development and performance of the business of the issuer and of its position for each year and interim period for which historical financial information is required, including the causes of material changes.

elements.documentation:
Where the offeror or person seeking admission to trading has been established for the past three years, the financial condition of the offeror or person seeking admission to trading over the past three years.
This shall be assessed based on a fair review of the development and performance of the business of the offeror or person seeking admission to trading and of its position for each year and interim period for which historical financial information is required, including the causes of material changes.
The review shall be a balanced and comprehensive analysis of the development and performance of the business of the offeror or person seeking admission to trading and of its position, consistent with the size and complexity of the business.
The analysis shall include both financial and, where appropriate, non-financial Key Performance Indicators relevant to the business.
The analysis shall, where appropriate, include references to, and additional explanations of, amounts reported in the annual financial statements (where available), information regarding unusual or infrequent events or new developments, materially affecting the income from operations and indicate the extent to which income was so affected, information concerning capital resources (both short term and long term) and an explanation of the sources and amounts of and a narrative description of the cash flows.

Where the offeror or person seeking admission to trading has not been established for the past three years, description of its financial condition since the date of its registration. The analysis shall include both financial and, where appropriate, non-financial Key Performance Indicators relevant to the particular business.
The analysis shall, where appropriate, include references to, and additional explanations of, amounts reported in the annual financial statements (when available), information regarding unusual or infrequent events or new developments, materially affecting the income from operations and indicate the extent to which income was so affected, information concerning capital resources (both short term and long term) and an explanation of the sources and amounts of and a narrative description of the cash flows.
This shall be assessed based on a fair review of the development and performance of the business of the offeror or person seeking admission to trading and of its position for each year and interim period for which historical financial information is available, including the causes of material changes.
The review shall be a balanced and comprehensive analysis of the development and performance of the business of the offeror or person seeking admission to trading and of its position, consistent with the size and complexity of the business.

'Article 6(5), points (e) and (f) of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. ‘The crypto-asset is not covered by the investor compensation schemes under Directive 97/9/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council.
The crypto-asset is not covered by the deposit guarantee schemes under Directive 2014/49/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council.’

'Statement in accordance with Article 6(5), point (d) of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. [Include statement where the offer to the public concerns a utility token]
‘The utility token may not be exchangeable against the good or service promised in the crypto-asset white paper, especially in the case of a failure or discontinuation of the crypto-asset project’

elements.name: mica:StatementEnsuringComplianceWithUnderlyingRegulation

elements.documentation: Statement in accordance with Article 6(3) of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. This crypto-asset white paper has not been approved by any competent authority in any Member State of the European Union. The offeror of the crypto-asset is solely responsible for the content of this crypto-asset white paper.’ Where relevant in accordance with Article 6(3), second subparagraph of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114, reference shall be made to ‘person seeking admission to trading' or to ‘operator of the trading platform’ instead of ‘offeror’.

elements.terseLabel: I.02 Statement in accordance with Article 51(3) of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114

elements.name: mica:WarningOnCoverageByCompensationSchemes
elements.label: Warning on coverage by compensation schemes
elements.documentation:
"In accordance with Article 51(4), points (a) and (b) of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. ‘This e-money token is not covered by the investor compensation schemes under Directive 97/9/EC.
This e-money token is not covered by the deposit guarantee schemes under Directive 2014/49/EU.’"

elements.name: mica:WarningOnSummaryLimitationsAndOfferConditionsForAssetreferencedTokenWhitePaper
elements.label: Warning on summary limitations and offer conditions for asset-referenced token white paper
elements.documentation: In accordance with Article 19(6), second subparagraph, of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114. This summary should be read as an introduction to the crypto-asset white paper. The prospective holder should base any decision to purchase this asset-referenced token on the content of the crypto-asset white paper as a whole and not on the summary alone. The offer to the public of this crypto-asset does not constitute an offer or solicitation to purchase financial instruments and that any such offer or solicitation can be made only by means of a prospectus or other offer documents pursuant to the applicable national law. This crypto-asset white paper does not constitute a prospectus as referred to in Regulation (EU) 2017/1129 of the European Parliament and of the Council (36) or any other offer document pursuant to Union or national law."
elements.terseLabel: I.04 Warning in accordance with Article 19(6), second subparagraph, of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114

elements.name: mica:WarningOnSummaryLimitationsAndOfferConditionsForEmoneyTokenWhitePaper
elements.label: Warning on summary limitations and offer conditions for e-money token white paper
elements.documentation: In accordance with Article 51(6), second subparagraph of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114s. This summary should be read as an introduction to the crypto-asset white paper. The prospective holder should base any decision to purchase this e-money token on the content of the crypto-asset white paper as a whole and not on the summary alone. The offer to the public of this crypto-asset does not constitute an offer or solicitation to purchase financial instruments and that any such offer or solicitation can be made only by means of a prospectus or other offer documents pursuant to the applicable national law. This crypto-asset white paper does not constitute a prospectus as referred to in Regulation (EU) 2017/1129 of the European Parliament and of the Council (36) or any other offer document pursuant to Union or national law."
elements.terseLabel: I.04 Warning in accordance with Article 51(4), points (a) and (b), of Regulation (EU) 2023/1114
